forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers by the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
